resources.string: Welcome to Layout Inspector, your go-to tool for effortless layout exploration! 🎉
In order to use Layout Inspector, you\'ll need to set it as your default assistant app.\nDon\'t worry, it\'s a simple process, and i\'ll guide you through it seamlessly.

You may experience occasional crashes, especially on certain devices (Realme).
Unfortunately, the cause of these crashes is beyond my control.😅

It's related to the intricate workings of the Android operating system, which can vary between different manufacturers and devices.
This variation can sometimes lead to unexpected behavior that may result in app crashes
Enable Use text from screen\n(Required to get information on screen content, layout inspector can only access it when explicitly invoked by user and only for views not declared as secure.)
Open Default Digital Assistant App Settings

Looks like you're all set 👍

Now you can activate the layout inspector like google assistant.
Just swipe up from a bottom corner to invoke Layout inspector if you are using gesture navigation otherwise you can press and hold Home button.
Looks like this activity has its curtains drawn, no peeking allowed! 🫣
